Uses of Class
org.ow2.bonita.facade.exception.TaskNotFoundException

Packages that use TaskNotFoundException
org.ow2.bonita.facade Contains interfaces for accessing Bonita APIs. 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.exception Contains exception classes thrown by Bonita APIs. 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.internal All interfaces in this package are for internal use only. 
 

Uses of TaskNotFoundException in org.ow2.bonita.facade
 

Methods in org.ow2.bonita.facade that throw TaskNotFoundException
 void RuntimeAPI.assignTask(ActivityInstanceUUID taskUUID)
          Launches the execution of both RoleResolver and Filters for the given task.
If a RoleResolver has been defined within the participant referenced by the performer of the task, it is executed.
If Filters have been defined within the activity of the task they are also executed.
 void RuntimeAPI.assignTask(ActivityInstanceUUID taskUUID, Set<String> candidates)
          Forces to replace the candidates set of the given task by the given candidates set.
 void RuntimeAPI.assignTask(ActivityInstanceUUID taskUUID, String actorId)
          Forces to assign the given task to the given actor id.
 boolean QueryRuntimeAPI.canExecuteTask(ActivityInstanceUUID taskUUID)
          Returns true if the given task is READY and: - if the task is assigned: if the assigned user is the logged user - if the task is not assigned: if the logged user is in the candidates list
 void RuntimeAPI.executeTask(ActivityInstanceUUID taskUUID, boolean assignTask)
          Executes the given task.
 void RuntimeAPI.finishTask(ActivityInstanceUUID taskUUID, boolean assignTask)
          Finishes the task.
 LightTaskInstance QueryRuntimeAPI.getLightTaskInstance(ActivityInstanceUUID taskUUID)
          Returns the record of the task with the given task UUID.
 TaskInstance QueryRuntimeAPI.getTask(ActivityInstanceUUID taskUUID)
          Returns the record of the task with the given task UUID.
 Set<String> QueryRuntimeAPI.getTaskCandidates(ActivityInstanceUUID taskUUID)
          Returns the candidates of the task with the given task UUID.
 Map<ActivityInstanceUUID,Set<String>> QueryRuntimeAPI.getTaskCandidates(Set<ActivityInstanceUUID> taskUUIDs)
          Returns the candidates of the tasks with the given task UUID.
 void RuntimeAPI.resumeTask(ActivityInstanceUUID taskUUID, boolean assignTask)
          Resumes the task if the task has SUSPENDED state.
 void RuntimeAPI.skipTask(ActivityInstanceUUID taskUUID, Map<String,Object> variablesToUpdate)
          Skips the task if the task has READY or FAILED state.
 void RuntimeAPI.startTask(ActivityInstanceUUID taskUUID, boolean assignTask)
          Starts the task.
 void RuntimeAPI.suspendTask(ActivityInstanceUUID taskUUID, boolean assignTask)
          Suspends the task if the task has EXECUTING state.
If successful, this operation changes task state from EXECUTING to SUSPENDED.
If the boolean assignTask is true the task is also assigned to the logged user otherwise the assignment of the task is not affected by this operation.
 void RuntimeAPI.unassignTask(ActivityInstanceUUID taskUUID)
          If this task had a userId set, set it to null.

 void AbstractRemoteRuntimeAPI.suspendTask(ActivityInstanceUUID taskUUID, boolean assignTask, Map<String,String> options)
          Suspends the task if the task has EXECUTING state.
If successful, this operation changes task state from EXECUTING to SUSPENDED.
If the boolean assignTask is true the task is also assigned to the logged user otherwise the assignment of the task is not affected by this operation.
